content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a very attractive option for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I was expecting. The location and the quality of the apartment deserve a higher price. How about 700 euros? That's a fair price considering the amenities and the neighborhood.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe that 500 euros is a fair price for an unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, but as the landlord, I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. If you're not willing to pay 700 euros, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 euros a month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 650 euros is still not enough for me. The apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I believe it's worth at least 700 euros per month. If you're not willing to pay that, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe that 650 euros is a fair price for an unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Max, but if you're not willing to meet my asking price of 700 euros, I'm afraid we won't be able to rent the apartment to you. Good luck with your search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
